mapper.insert: insert into user_info(user_id, user_pw, user_nick, user_email, user_phone, user_type) values(#{user_id}, #{user_pw}, #{user_nick}, #{user_email}, #{user_phone}, #{user_type})
mapper.select: select * from user_info where user_id=#{user_id} and user_pw=#{user_pw}
